TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestCachePolicy extends System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy

summary.span: 为通过使用 对象获取的资源定义应用程序的缓存要求。

span.span: Defines an application's caching requirements for resources obtained by using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过使用为应用程序中指定的默认缓存策略属性或应用程序或计算机配置文件。You can specify a default cache policy for your application by using the property or the application or machine configuration files. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <requestCaching>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). 可以通过使用指定的单个请求的缓存策略属性。You can specify the cache policy for an individual request by using the property. 不支持 Web 服务的缓存。Caching for Web services is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建应用程序域的默认缓存策略，并请求将重写它。The following code example creates a default cache policy for the application domain, and overrides it for a request. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#2)]

related.span: 网络应用程序的缓存管理

span.span: Cache Management for Network Applications

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime cacheSyncDate) cil managed

param.name: cacheSyncDate
param.span: 一个 对象，它指定必须重新验证缓存中存储的资源的时间。

span.span: A object that specifies the time when resources stored in the cache must be revalidated.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓存同步日期初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache synchronization date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存同步日期允许指定必须重新验证缓存内容的绝对日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果在缓存同步日期之前最后一次重新验证缓存项，会发生与服务器重新验证。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果缓存同步日期后重新验证缓存项，并使缓存的条目无效没有服务器重新验证要求，则使用缓存中的条目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果缓存同步日期设置为未来某个日期，则每次请求时都会重新验证该条目，直到缓存同步日期过去。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 。This constructor initializes the property to . 将 属性初始化为 `cacheSyncDate`。The property is initialized to `cacheSyncDate`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建基于缓存同步日期的缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on a cache synchronization date. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel level) cil managed

span.span: An value.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓存策略初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 `level`。This constructor initializes the property to `level`. 值控制是否启用缓存，以及何时可以使用缓存。The value controls whether caching is enabled, and when the cache can be used. 有关其他信息，请参阅文档。For additional information, see the documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建允许缓存以用于从缓存中找到资源的缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy that allows resources found in the cache to be used from the cache. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cacheAgeControl`值定义的含义`ageOrFreshOrStale`参数值以及用于设置关联的属性。The `cacheAgeControl` value defines the meaning of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter value and is used to set the associated property. 例如，指定，则属性设置的值为`ageOrFreshOrStale`参数。For example, when you specify , the property is set to the value of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter. 此构造函数将 属性初始化为 。This constructor initializes the property to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建基于最低新鲜度的缓存策略。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on minimum freshness. value.span: 如果未指定日期，此属性的值则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存同步日期允许指定必须重新验证缓存内容的绝对日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果在缓存同步日期之前最后一次重新验证缓存项，会发生与服务器重新验证。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果缓存同步日期后重新验证缓存项，并使缓存的条目无效没有服务器重新验证要求，则使用缓存中的条目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果缓存同步日期设置为未来某个日期，则每次请求时都会重新验证该条目，直到缓存同步日期过去。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#3)]

summary.span: 获取创建此实例时指定的 值。

span.span: Gets the value that was specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定使用 对象获取的资源的缓存行为。

span.span: A value that specifies the cache behavior for resources that were obtained using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通常使用作为其缓存策略级别。Applications typically use as their cache policy level. 属性，如果不是`null`，确定对请求有效的缓存策略。The property, if not `null`, determines the cache policy in effect for a request. 可以使用设置的应用程序域的默认策略属性或通过在计算机中的设置或应用程序配置文件。The default policy for the application domain can be set using the property or by settings in the machine or application configuration files. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <requestCaching>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#11)]

summary.span: 获取从缓存返回的资源所允许的最大生存期。

span.span: Gets the maximum age permitted for a resource returned from the cache.

value.span: 一个 值，被设置为创建此实例时指定的最大生存期值。

span.span: A value that is set to the maximum age value specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 如果未指定日期，此属性的值则为 。

span.span: If no date was specified, this property's value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该资源的缓存的副本早于指定的时间值，则必须重新验证该资源。If the cached copy of the resource is older than the specified time value, the resource must be revalidated. 在构造实例时指定此属性的值。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定在此期间的资源的缓存的副本是可接受的内容过期后的时间量。This property specifies the amount of time after content expiration during which the cached copy of the resource is acceptable. 在构造实例时指定此属性的值。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
